mdRecord.dcterms:description: Command for reader to get off phone. Reference to sex toy, to which someone responds disparagingly about the Phi Society. Commentary on fraternity Sigma Alpha Epsilon. Reference to female breasts, to which someone responds with LOL. An apology. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.

get off ur phone | I currently have a dildo in my butt. AND NOBODY KNOWS ←Φ Society just saves the $ & fists each other | Nice Try, Kobe Fans | SAE did single-handedly save the camo industry though... | the rare two nippled boob | Lol | Lineups are fun | Sorry Jeremy
